source.a3066118:
# Bar plot by gender
plt.figure(figsize=(6,6))
sns.countplot(x='gender', data=df)

ax = plt.gca()
for p in ax.patches:
    ax.text(p.get_x() + p.get_width()/2, p.get_height(), '%d' % int(p.get_height()),
    fontsize=16, color='red', ha='center', va='bottom')

plt.show()
source.824d3873:
# Bar plot by race/ethnicity
plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))
df['race/ethnicity'].value_counts().plot.bar()

ax = plt.gca()
for p in ax.patches:
    ax.text(p.get_x() + p.get_width()/2, p.get_height(), '%d' % int(p.get_height()),
    fontsize=16, color='red', ha='center', va='bottom')

plt.show()
source.2d4790a3:
# Count plot by race/ethnicity
plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))
sns.countplot(df['race/ethnicity'])

ax = plt.gca()
for p in ax.patches:
    ax.text(p.get_x() + p.get_width()/2, p.get_height(), '%d' % int(p.get_height()),
    fontsize=16, color='red', ha='center', va='bottom')

plt.title('Number of Students by Race/Ethnicity')
plt.ylabel('Number of Students')
plt.xlabel('Race/Ethnicity')
plt.xticks(rotation = 90)
    
plt.show()

sns.countplot(df['parental level of education'])

    ax.text(p.get_x() + p.get_width()/2, p.get_height(), '%d' % int(p.get_height()),
    fontsize=16, color='red', ha='center', va='bottom')

plt.title('Number of Students by Parental Level of Education')
plt.ylabel('Number of Students')
plt.xlabel('parental level of education')
plt.xticks(rotation = 90)
    
plt.show()

# Relationship plot by reading score vs writing score
plt.figure(figsize=(12,6))

sns.relplot(x='reading score', y='writing score', 
            hue='test preparation course', 
            size='lunch', 
            sizes=(20,40), 
            col='gender', 
            data=df)
